low-level-tx-endpoints.name: tx-ep
low-level-tx-endpoints.compression: iq-bitwidth: 9, 14, 16 for BFP or 16 for fix point <--> 9 compression-method: BLOCK_FLOATING_POINT for BFP or NO_COMPRESSION for fix point <--> BLOCK_FLOATING_POINT

low-level-rx-endpoints.name: rx-ep
low-level-rx-endpoints.compression: iq-bitwidth: 9, 14, 16 for BFP or 16 for fix point <--> 9 compression-method: BLOCK_FLOATING_POINT for BFP or NO_COMPRESSION for fix point <--> BLOCK_FLOATING_POINT
